original_text: And the twelve gates were twelve pearls: every several gate was of one pearl: and the street of the city was pure gold, as it were transparent glass.
korean_text: 그 열두 문은 열두 진주니 각 문마다 한 개의 진주로 되어 있고 성의 길은 맑은 유리 같은 정금이더라

sentences.original_text: And the twelve gates were twelve pearls:
sentences.korean_translation: 그 열두 개의 문은 열두 개의 진주였으며

sentences.original_text: every several gate was of one pearl:
and the street of the city was pure gold,
